openaiSpec.name: mboum_calendar_events
openaiSpec.description: Access Mboum's financial calendar events API (v2), focusing on time-sensitive financial events such as earnings announcements, IPOs, stock splits, dividend payments, and economic events. This plugin provides data about upcoming and past financial events to help with investment planning and market analysis.

requestDetails.description: An object containing the target Mboum calendar events endpoint and its specific parameters.

endpoint.description: The specific calendar events endpoint to query. Supports: ipo (v1), splits (v1), economic (v1), earnings (v2), dividends (v2)

queryParams.description: Parameters for the chosen endpoint. Varies by endpoint version (v1/v2)

days.description: Number of days to look ahead (v2 endpoints only)

optionable.description: Filter by optionable status (v2 earnings only)
